name: OEM - Lenovo - Configure Commercial Vantage System Updates
description: This configures the updates available in the LCU tool for users to install when they go in and scan for updates.  By not configuring, defaults are applied, and all updates are available.

options.name: LCVCompanyName
options.description: Name you want to show up in any popups from LCV

options.name: LCVSUFilterCriticalApplication
options.description: This will Enable Critical Application to be updated by LCV Manual Scan
